UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Cacaoidin, First Member of the New Lanthidin RiPP Family
Literature.Author: Ortiz-López FJ, Carretero-Molina D, Sánchez-Hidalgo M, González-Martín J, González I, Román-Hurtado F, de la Cruz M, García-Fernández S, Reyes F, Deisinger JP, Müller AT, Schneider T, Genilloud O

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus simulans 22(MIC90=0.25µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC90=0.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus SG511(MIC=2µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus SG511 DapR(MIC90=32µg/ml),Mycobacterium tuberculosis H37Ra(MIC90=32µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis 168(MIC90=8µg/ml),Clostridioides difficile(MIC90=4-8µg/ml)
